com.logituit.logixsdk.ads

Class LogixAdsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logituit.logixsdk.ads.LogixAdsController

  • public class LogixAdsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for controlling,initializing Ads and their related events

        public LogixAdsController(android.content.Context context,
                          android.net.Uri adUri,
                          com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer player,
                          LogixAdEventListener logixAdEventListener)
        Parameters:
        context - A Context
        adUri - A Uri of ad to be played
        player - A SimpleExoPlayer instance as videoplayer
        logixAdEventListener - A LogixAdEventListener is an event listener for the ad to be played

    • Method Detail

      • getAdsMediaSource

        public com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.MediaSource getAdsMediaSource(com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.MediaSource mediaSource,
                                                                          java.lang.String adUrl,
                                                                          LogixPlayerView playerView,
                                                                          android.view.ViewGroup mCompanionViewGroup)
        This method returns video including the ad to be inserted between the video in the form of mediaSource This method is called while inserting ad in current video.
        Parameters:
        mediaSource - A MediaSource is the mediaSource of the current video in the playlist
        adUrl - This is the url of the ad to be played in between the video
        playerView - A LogixPlayerView is the player view where the video including ad will be played
        Returns:
        A MediaSource

      • getAdsMediaSource

        public com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.MediaSource getAdsMediaSource(com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.MediaSource mediaSource,
                                                                          java.lang.String adUrl,
                                                                          LogixPlayerView playerView,
                                                                          com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.ImaSdkSettings imaSdkSettings,
                                                                          int bitrate,
                                                                          android.view.ViewGroup mCompanionViewGroup)
        This method returns video including the ad to be inserted between the video in the form of mediaSource considering the imaSettings and bitrates to be used by the ad This method initializes imaLoader,dataSourceFactory and event listener for ad
        Parameters:
        mediaSource - A MediaSource is the mediaSource of the current video in the playlist
        adUrl - This is the url of the ad to be played in between the video
        playerView - A LogixPlayerView is the player view where the video including ad will be played
        imaSdkSettings - A ImaSdkSettings for imaSdkSettings
        bitrate - Max Bit rate for the ad
        Returns:
        A MediaSource

        public void lateInitAdLoader()
        Initializes the adsController at runtime if not initialized already.

        public boolean isPlayingAd()
        returns if ad is being played
        Returns:
        a boolean value stating whether ad is playing or not

      • getCurrentAdGroupIndex

        public int getCurrentAdGroupIndex()
        This method returns current ad group index of currently playing ad
        Returns:
        integer value as the index of the current adGroup of the ad being played

      • getCurrentAdIndexInAdGroup

        public int getCurrentAdIndexInAdGroup()
        This method returns the index of the currently playing ad in the adGroup
        Returns:
        integer value as the index of the current playing ad in the adGroup

      • getAdProgress

        public com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.player.VideoProgressUpdate getAdProgress()
        This method returns progress of the currently playing ad i.e current time of the ad playing out of it's total duration
        Returns:
        A VideoProgressUpdate

      • releaseAdsLoader

        public void releaseAdsLoader(LogixPlayerView playerView)
        This method releases adsLoader and is to be called while releasing player i.e. in releasePlayer()
        Parameters:
        playerView - A LogixPlayerView is the player view where the video including ad will be played

      • adAction

        public void adAction(int action)
        This method performs the specified action on the current ad refer @AD_ACTION_PAUSE @AD_ACTION_PLAY @AD_ACTION_RESUME @AD_ACTION_STOP
        Parameters:
        action - This is an integer value for actions i.e states (play, resume, pause, stop) of the ad
